text: Ane tamaro palanahara spasta rite adesa api cukayo che ke tame tene chodine an'yani bandagi na karaso ane mata-pita sathe sadavartana karajo jo tamari hajarimam temana manthi eka athava banne vrd'dhavasthamam pahonci jaya to temane “upha” pana na kaheso, na to temane thapako apaso, parantu temani sathe sabhyatathi vata karajo
